sentences.en: a blade of grass
sentences.cn: 一片草叶

sentences.en: A gust of breeze moved down the hillside, ruffling the grass.
sentences.cn: 一阵微风吹下山坡，使青草如波浪起伏。

sentences.en: Grass fires have seared the land near the farming village of Basekhai.
sentences.cn: 草地野火烧焦了巴斯克亥农庄附近的土地。

sentences.en: Grass shears are specially made to trim grass growing in awkward places.
sentences.cn: 除草剪刀；专门用于修剪缝隙角落里的青草。

sentences.en: He moved on through wet grass that soaked his trouser legs.
sentences.cn: 他继续前行，穿过湿漉漉的草地，裤腿全湿透了。

sentences.en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentences.cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentences.en: I walked across the grass.
sentences.cn: 我走在草地上。

sentences.en: Keep off the grass.
sentences.cn: 请勿践踏草地。

sentences.en: She enjoyed the feel of grass beneath her feet.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢踩在草上的感觉。

sentences.en: Small things stirred in the grass around the tent.
sentences.cn: 一些小东西在帐篷四周的草丛里窸窸窣窣地动着。

sentences.en: The grass in the yard was waist high.
sentences.cn: 院子里的草有齐腰高。

sentences.en: the mare will be out at grass during the day.
sentences.cn: 白天母马都在外面放牧。

sentences.en: The satin slippers tread daintily through the dewy grass.
sentences.cn: 缎子拖鞋轻盈地踏过沾着露珠的草地。

sentences.en: The soft wind breathed their names to the newborn grass.
sentences.cn: 轻风把他们的名字吹向刚刚长出的小草。

sentences.en: The windows overlooked a lawn of tall waving grass.
sentences.cn: 窗户外边是一块草地，高高的草随风摇摆。

sentences.en: Their four children turn cartwheels in the grass as we talk.
sentences.cn: 我们说话的时候，他们家的4个孩子在草地上玩侧手翻。

sentences.en: There was a smell of trampled grass and earth.
sentences.cn: 有踩烂的青草与泥土的味道。

sentences.en: They should concentrate on rejuvenating the existing vegetation, like grass and shrubs.
sentences.cn: 他们应该侧重于修整现有的绿化植被，比如草和灌木。

sentences.en: Two men were attempting to scythe the long grass.
sentences.cn: 两个人正试图割掉疯长的草。

sentences.en: With one accord they turned and walked back over the grass.
sentences.cn: 他们步调一致地转身走过草坪。

phrases.tran_cn: ◎(牲畜)被放牧在草场上，放牧，放草

phrases.phrase: not let the grass grow under one's feet
phrases.tran_cn: 不要行动迟缓；不要错失良机

phrases.phrase: the grass is always greener on the other side of t

trans.tran_cn: 草，青草，草地，草坪，告密者，〈俚〉龙须菜
trans.tran_en: an area of grass, especially an area where the grass is kept cut short
an area of grass, especially an area where the grass is kept cut short

trans.tran_cn: 用草覆盖，使…长满草，使…吃草
